remarks: The zero vector is a left identity element.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nv0id.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nv0id.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nv0id.6 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
nv0lid $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z G A ) = A ) $.
